comments:
When I have deleted existing connection and try to generate DDL I received NullPointerException exception. The effect appears as well if I have imported a project that is set as java persistence project from other installation of Eclipse. My proposal is better error handling to be done, because this behavior is confusing for the user (there isn?t visible action, only log in Error Log view).

EXCEPTION:

Just to be sure there aren't any misunderstandings, at this time there is no plan for a 0.5.x maintenance release, as we are currently focusing all of our efforts on the 1.0 stream.

Releated information:  For 1.0, we plan to remove our internal DDL generation code and instead integrate with a given JPA runtime implementation from within the Dali UI (given that all of the JPA runtime implementations should implement DDL generation from Entities).
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
